law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 187, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 265, secs. 1(2) to (5).

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Authorization of experimental programs -- Administrative regulations.
